name: Gold Coast luxury deluxe Theme
description: Vast collection of free themes & wallpapers are waiting for you!  Feel like somethings missing on your home screen? Download the Gold Deluxe Luxury Samsung J7 theme to give your phone some style. Gold Deluxe Luxury Samsung J7 is an Android mobile theme with 3D effects, 3D weather, app icon packs and Gold Deluxe Luxury Samsung J7 wallpapers. Gold Deluxe Luxury Samsung J7 is supported on most Android devices, including Samsung Galaxy J7, Samsung S7 Edge, Huawei Mate 8 and many more. Install the Gold Deluxe Luxury Samsung J7 theme for a 3D home screen and to make your phone look cool!   Gold Deluxe Luxury Samsung J7 Features:  App Icon pack: over 50 beautiful app icons with Gold Deluxe Luxury Samsung J7 wallpapers, giving you a visual experience youve never experienced before. In addition to the system app icons, we also designed custom-made app icons for popular apps, such as Facebook, YouTube and more. Let your mobile interface be beautiful and unique.  3D Weather: In addition to beautiful app icons and Gold Deluxe Luxury Samsung J7 wallpapers, we also provide dynamic 3D Weather functions.  To install Gold Deluxe Luxury Samsung J7, please install our Launcher first.  Our Launcher offers a variety of features:  Lock screen: Designed not only for privacy protection, but also includes personalized lock screen support for the Gold Deluxe Luxury Samsung J7 theme to ensure perfect harmony between your home screen and lock screen.  Phone boost: Junk file cleaning and 1-tap boost functions helps you avoid device lag  Charge Master: Personalized Gold Deluxe Luxury Samsung J7 themed phone charging protection   Theme Center: We have many free themes, such as the popular luxury gold theme, which is packed with golden wallpapers and golden diamond app icons to give your phone a luxurious makeover. Furthermore, we also have plenty of cool 3D themes, as well as the festive Halloween and Christmas themes for you to choose from!  Wallpaper Center: We also provide several dynamic wallpapers, including the Golden Rose dynamic wallpaper. In addition, there are thousands of HD wallpapers updated every day.  Install the Gold Deluxe Luxury Samsung J7 theme to not only enjoy a vast collection HD wallpapers, dynamic wallpapers and 3D themes, but it also includes 3D clock, 3D weather and a variety of flip-screen transition effects.
